synopsis: Middle-aged bride Ann Hamilton soon begins to suspect that her charming husband is really a psychotic who plans to murder her.

title: The Enforcer
synopsis: A crusading district attorney finally gets a chance to prosecute the organizer and boss of Murder Inc.

title: Pushover
synopsis: Undercover cop falls for the beautiful moll of a bank robber on the run and together they plan to double-cross the hood and the cops.

title: Gun Crazy
synopsis: Two disturbed young people release their fascination with guns through a crime spree.

title: The Blue Gardenia
synopsis: A telephone operator ends up drunk and at the mercy of a cad in his apartment. The next morning she wakes up with a hangover and the terrible fear she may be a murderess.

title: Brute Force
synopsis: At a tough penitentiary, prisoner Joe Collins plans to rebel against Captain Munsey, the power-mad chief guard.

title: Clash by Night
synopsis: Mae Doyle comes back to her hometown a cynical woman. Her brother Joe fears that his love, fish cannery worker Peggy, may wind up like Mae. Mae marries Jerry and has a baby; she is happy but restless, drawn to Jerry's friend Earl.

title: The Breaking Point
synopsis: An otherwise moral captain of a charter boat becomes financially strapped and is drawn into illegal activities in order to keep up payments on his boat.

title: Violent Saturday
synopsis: Three men case a small town very carefully, with plans to rob the bank on the upcoming Saturday, which turns violent and deadly.

title: Dead Reckoning
synopsis: A soldier runs away rather than receive the Medal of Honor, so his buddy gets permission to investigate, and love and death soon follow.

title: They Drive by Night
synopsis: When one of two truck-driving brothers loses an arm, they both join a transport company where the other is falsely charged as an accessory in the murder of the owner.

title: Deadline - U.S.A.
synopsis: With his newspaper about to be sold, crusading editor Ed Hutcheson tries to complete an exposé on gangster Rienzi.

title: The Mob
synopsis: Johnny Damico botches a murder case and is suspended from the force. In reality, he is put undercover to identify the mysterious boss of the NY waterfront who has murdered everyone in his way. Will Johnny be next in line?

title: The Dark Mirror
synopsis: A man is found murdered, and witnesses are sure about the woman they saw leaving his apartment. However, it becomes apparent that the woman has a twin, and finding out which one is the killer seems impossible.

title: Impact
synopsis: A unfaithful wife plots with her lover to kill her husband, but the lover is accidentally killed instead. The husband stays in hiding, and lets his wife be charged with conspiracy.

title: The Glass Key
synopsis: A crooked politician finds himself being accused of murder by a gangster from whom he refused help during a re-election campaign.

title: Hangmen Also Die!
synopsis: After the Nazi administrator of Czechoslovakia is shot, his assassin tries to elude the Gestapo and struggles with his impulse to give himself up as hostages are executed.

title: Rope of Sand
synopsis: A man abused by a sadistic mining company cop before he could tell where on their desert property he'd found diamonds decides to steal them instead.

title: Hollow Triumph
synopsis: Pursued by the big-time gambler he robbed, John Muller assumes a new identity - with unfortunate results.

title: The Red House
synopsis: An old man and his sister are concealing a terrible secret from their adopted teen daughter, concerning a hidden abandoned farmhouse, located deep in the woods.

title: Convicted
synopsis: A D.A. becomes the prison warden where he tries to help an inmate he prosecuted, because he believes his sentence was excessive.

title: The Chase
synopsis: Chuck Scott gets a job as chauffeur to tough guy Eddie Roman; but Chuck's involvement with Eddie's fearful wife becomes a nightmare.

title: 99 River Street
synopsis: A former boxer turned cab driver has to hide from the police when his badgering wife is murdered by the jewel thief she was having an affair with.

title: All Through the Night
synopsis: Runyonesque Broadway gamblers turn patriotic when they stumble onto a cell of Nazi saboteurs.

title: The Long Night
synopsis: Police surround the apartment of apparent murderer Joe Adams, who refuses to surrender although escape appears impossible. During the siege, Joe reflects on the circumstances that led him to this situation.

title: All My Sons
synopsis: During WW2, industrialist Joe Keller commits a crime and frames his business partner Herbert Deever but years later his sin comes back to haunt him when Joe's son plans to marry Deever's daughter.

title: I Walk Alone
synopsis: Frankie Madison leaves prison expecting a share from his ex-partner. But Prohibition bootlegging didn't prepare Frankie for Big Business.

title: Lady in the Lake
synopsis: The lady editor of a crime magazine hires Phillip Marlowe to find the wife of her boss. The private detective soon finds himself involved in murder.

title: Summer Storm
synopsis: In this filmed Chekhov adaptation, Olga is an alluring peasant woman who lures cynical aristocrat Fedor away from his milquetoast fiancée, with tragic consequences.

title: Over-Exposed
synopsis: Sexy blonde dance club girl learns the photography trade and moves to New York in pursuit of a new career.

title: The Man Between
synopsis: In post-WW2 Berlin, when travel to the East was still possible, the sister of a British officer from West Berlin is abducted by Communist agents and taken into the Soviet sector where her eventual rescue is arranged by a German smuggler.

title: Human Desire
synopsis: A Korean War vet returns to his job as a railroad engineer and becomes involved in an affair with a co-worker's wife following a murder on a train where they meet.

title: The Phenix City Story
synopsis: A crime-busting lawyer and his initially reluctant attorney father take on the forces that run gambling and prostitution in their small Southern town.

title: The Window
synopsis: To avoid the heat of a sweltering summer night a 9-year-old Manhattan boy decides to sleep on the fire escape and witnesses a murder, but no one will believe him.

title: A Kiss Before Dying
synopsis: A ruthless college student resorts to murder in an attempt to marry an heiress.
